statements: SELECT * FROM tv_program_engagement;
SELECT program_name, audience_size FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE audience_size > 1000;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM tv_program_engagement ORDER BY audience_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 8.0;
SELECT program_name, audience_size, engagement_score FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE program_name LIKE 'Game%';
SELECT * FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE audience_size > 1000 ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, engagement_score FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE audience_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT program_name, audience_size FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 8 ORDER BY audience_size ASC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, audience_size, engagement_score FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE audience_size < 500 OR engagement_score < 5;
SELECT * FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE program_name LIKE 'Game%' AND engagement_score >= 7 ORDER BY audience_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM TV_Programs;
SELECT program_name, genre FROM TV_Programs WHERE air_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, air_date FROM TV_Programs ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Data WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT program_name, likes, comments FROM TV_Programs INNER JOIN Social_Media_Data ON TV_Programs.program_id = Social_Media_Data.program_id WHERE likes > 500 ORDER BY comments DESC;
SELECT program_name, genre FROM TV_Programs WHERE air_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Data WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, likes FROM TV_Programs JOIN Social_Media_Data ON TV_Programs.program_id = Social_Media_Data.program_id WHERE platform='Twitter' AND shares < 50;
SELECT program_name, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM TV_Programs JOIN Social_Media_Data ON TV_Programs.program_id = Social_Media_Data.program_id GROUP BY program_name HAVING total_likes > 5000;

SELECT program_name, genre, post_date FROM TV_Programs JOIN Social_Media_Data ON TV_Programs.program_id = Social_Media_Data.program_id WHERE genre = 'Drama' AND post_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM tv_programs;
SELECT program_name, genre FROM tv_programs WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT program_id, program_name, release_date FROM tv_programs ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, genre, engagement_count FROM tv_programs JOIN social_media_engagement ON tv_programs.program_id = social_media_engagement.program_id WHERE engagement_count > 1000;
SELECT user_name, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 5000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM tv_programs WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT program_name, release_date FROM tv_programs ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, SUM(engagement_count) as total_engagement FROM tv_programs JOIN social_media_engagement ON tv_programs.program_id = social_media_engagement.program_id GROUP BY program_name;
SELECT program_name, user_name, followers_count FROM tv_programs JOIN social_media_users ON tv_programs.program_id = social_media_users.user_id ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT program_name, engagement_type, engagement_count FROM tv_programs JOIN social_media_engagement ON tv_programs.program_id = social_media_engagement.program_id WHERE engagement_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM TV_Programs;
SELECT program_name, program_genre FROM TV_Programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_duration FROM TV_Programs WHERE program_duration > 30;
SELECT program_name, program_genre FROM TV_Programs WHERE program_genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Stats WHERE likes > 1000;
SELECT * FROM TV_Programs WHERE program_genre='Comedy'
SELECT program_name, program_duration FROM TV_Programs ORDER BY program_duration DESC
SELECT AVG(likes) AS avg_likes, AVG(shares) AS avg_shares FROM Social_Media_Stats
SELECT program_name, total_viewers FROM TV_Programs INNER JOIN Audience_Stats ON TV_Programs.program_id = Audience_Stats.program_id WHERE viewer_gender='Female'
SELECT program_name, ad_type, ad_revenue FROM TV_Programs JOIN Ad_Revenue ON TV_Programs.program_id = Ad_Revenue.program_id WHERE ad_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY ad_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM tv_programs;
SELECT program_name, genre FROM tv_programs WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT * FROM viewership_data ORDER BY view_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_data WHERE ad_cost > 1000 ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT program_name, post_time FROM social_media_data INNER JOIN tv_programs ON social_media_data.program_id = tv_programs.program_id WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT * FROM tv_programs WHERE genre = 'Thriller';
SELECT program_name, air_time FROM tv_programs ORDER BY air_time DESC;
SELECT program_name, genre FROM tv_programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(program_id) AS program_count, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score FROM social_media_data GROUP BY platform;
SELECT program_name, advertiser, ad_impressions FROM advertising_data WHERE ad_cost > 500.00 ORDER BY ad_impressions DESC;
